description: Tehran - Hossein Amir Abdollahian was widely regarded as a dedicated and diligent diplomat throughout his relatively long career.
title: Martyr Amir Abdollahian strengthened Iran’s position in the world: Bolivia’s ambassador

description: TEHRAN – Iran will play defending champions Malaysia in the final match of the 2024 Men's Indoor Hockey Asia Cup on Saturday.
title: Iran to meet Malaysia at 2024 Men's Indoor Hockey Asia Cup final

description: Israeli officials seized a camera and broadcasting equipment belonging to The Associated Press in southern Israel on Tuesday, accusing the news organization of violating a new media law by providing images to Al Jazeera.
title: Israel seizes AP equipment

description: TEHRAN - The Islamic Resistance in Iraq has expanded its operations against the Israeli occupation regime, staging five attacks in less than 24 hours against Israeli sites in solidarity with Gaza.
title: Iraqis expand anti-Israeli operations

description: European Union foreign policy chief Josep Borrell said on Friday some European countries were trying to intimidate International Criminal Court judges over a case against Israeli leaders, and must stop “meddling” and respect the court.
title: Borrell warns Israel not to threaten ICC judges

description: China staged mock missile strikes and dispatched fighter jets carrying live missiles along with bombers on Friday, state broadcaster CCTV said, as part of exercises Beijing has said were launched to punish Taiwan's new president, Lai Ching-te.
title: China stages mock missile strikes on Taiwan

description: The spokesperson for the German government on Wednesday said they would “of course” abide by an International Criminal Court (ICC) arrest order for Israeli officials if approved.
title: Germany says it would detain Netanyahu if ICC arrest warrant issued

description: Foreign Minister Israel Katz announced Friday that the Spanish consulate in al-Quds will no longer provide services to Palestinians from the West Bank following Spain’s announcement that it will recognize an independent Palestinian state alongside Israel.
title: Israel forbids Spanish consulate in al-Quds from serving Palestinians

description: As Al-Aqsa Hospital in Deir el-Balah struggles to get fuel, its oxygen generators may run out of power, putting the lives of 20 newborns in peril, the UN’s children agency, UNICEF, warned.
title: UNICEF: Twenty newborns at risk in Al-Aqsa Hospital

description: TEHRAN-In the wake of the passing of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and a number of local officials, filmmakers from various countries expressed their condolences to the Iranian representatives at Iran’s booth at Cannes Film Market during the ongoing Cannes Film Festival.
title: Intl. cinema professionals sympathize with Iranian representatives at Cannes Film Market

description: TEHRAN - In a note, Kayhan discussed the disappointment of the Persian-language media due to the unity of the people after the martyrdom of Raisi and his entourage.
title: Iranians disappointed foreign media

description: TEHRAN - Pakistan has formally expressed its confidence in Iran's comprehensive investigation capabilities following the tragic helicopter crash that claimed the lives of Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdollahian, and their accompanying delegation.
title: Islamabad expresses confidence in Tehran's investigation of Raisi's helicopter crash

description: TEHRAN – The Iranian Foreign Ministry has affirmed that the country's progress and influential roles on regional and international stages will remain steadfast, despite the tragic deaths of President Ebrahim Raisi and his companions in the Sunday helicopter crash.
title: Iran to remain steadfast despite tragic death of top officials: Spokesman

description: KYOTO, JAPAN - From the early hours of broadcasting news about the potential accident involving the helicopter carrying the President of Iran, Japanese TV and media have provided meticulous, moment-by-moment updates.
title: Japan and the recent tragedy of Iran

description: British police have arrested 16 people at a protest organized by a pro-Palestinian student group at Oxford University, in the latest flare-up on a prestigious campus over the war in Gaza, Le Monde reported.
title: UK arrests anti-war protesters

description: TEHRAN - Senator Rand Paul, a Republican from Kentucky, has openly questioned the impact of imposing sanctions on the advancement of Iran, China, and Russia, suggesting they have been largely ineffective.
title: U.S. Senator questions sanctions’ effectiveness on Iran, Russia, and China

description: Jeremy Corbyn has announced he is standing as an independent candidate in Islington North.
title: Corbyn to run as an independent in UK general election

description: TEHRAN- In a televised speech on Friday, Sayyed Hassan Nasrallah, the Secretary General of the Lebanese Hezbollah resistance movement, lauded the late President of Iran, Ebrahim Raisi, for his unwavering bravery in confronting arrogance and hypocrisy.
title: Raisi was very courageous in confronting arrogance, hypocrisy: Nasrallah

description: TEHRAN- Israel has slipped further into international isolation after the International Court of Justice (ICJ) ordered the regime to stop its offensive in Rafah.
title: ICJ orders Israel to halt Rafah offensive

description: TEHRAN-The Persian translation of the book “Cowboy Graves” written by the Chilean novelist and short story writer Roberto Bolaño has hit the Iranian bookstores.
title: Roberto Bolaño’s “Cowboy Graves” published in Persian

description: TEHRAN-Celebrated Iranian filmmaker Asghar Farhadi will serve as a jury member at the upcoming Tribeca Festival, due to be held from June 5 to 16 in New York City, the U.S.
title: Asghar Farhadi on jury of Tribeca Festival

description: TEHRAN – The chief commander of the Islamic Revolution Guards Corps (IRGC) has praised the late President Ebrahim Raisi for his "indescribable bravery" during Iran's retaliatory operation against Israel.
title: IRGC chief commends late President’s bravery in retaliatory strike against Israel

description: TEHRAN- Iran’s interim president, Mohammad Mokhber, received a phone call from Saudi Crown Prince Mohammad bin Salman on Friday afternoon in which he underscored that the cordial relations between Tehran and Riyadh will continue after the passing of President Ebrahim Raisi.
title: Cordial Iran-Saudi ties to continue: Mokhber

description: TEHRAN – Perseopolis football team came from three goals down to beat struggling Esteghlal Khuzestan 4-3 in Iran’s 2023/24 Persian Gulf Pro League (PGPL) here at the Azadi Stadium on Friday.
title: Persepolis leapfrog Esteghlal at top of Iran’s PGPL

description: BEIJING – At the request of the Chinese public the Iranian embassy in Beijing held a memorial ceremony on Friday for President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Amir Abdollahian, and their companions.
title: The Chinese people offer condolences over President Raisi’s death

description: TEHRAN – Ambassadors from the Organization of the Islamic Cooperation (OIC) in the United Nations office in Geneva held a special session on Friday to remember Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi, Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian and their entourage who were martyred in a helicopter crash on Sunday in northwestern Iran.
title: President Raisi, FM Amir Abdollahian remembered at UN office in Geneva

description: TEHRAN - Like Israel, Britain and the United States feel irritated as International Criminal Court Prosecutor General Ahmad Khan is seeking arrest warrants for Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu and his war minister Yoav Gallant for “war crimes” and “crimes against humanity” against the Palestinian people in the blockaded Gaza Strip.
title: UK-US stance against ICC is scandalous

description: TEHRAN – Leader of the Islamic Revolution Ayatollah Seyed Ali Khamenei visited the family of late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi on Wednesday night to offer his condolences.
title: Massive funeral ceremonies for President a message to the world in favor of Iran: Leader

description: TEHRAN - The late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian were laid to rest in Mashhad and Tehran, respectively, concluding days of funeral attended by several millions of mourners.
title: United for Iran

description: TEHRAN- Ammar Hakim, the leader of Iraq's national wisdom movement, visited the home of the late Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdolahian to offer his condolences to the minister's family and honor his contributions to the resistance front in the region.
title: Ammar Hakim offers condolences to family of late Iranian foreign minister

description: TEHRAN- Ammar Hakim, the leader of Iraq's national wisdom movement, visited the home of the late Iranian Foreign Minister Hossein Amir-Abdolahian to offer his condolences to the minister's family and honor his contributions to the resistance front in the region.
title: Ammar Hakim Pays Respects to Amir-Abdollahian meeting his family

description: TEHRAN - On the sidelines of the funeral ceremony for the late Iranian President Ebrahim Raisi and Foreign Minister Hossein Amir Abdollahian, leaders of several resistance groups convened with high-ranking commanders of the Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) in Tehran.
title: Resistance groups meet with top IRGC commanders

description:
* A collection of paintings by Maryam Namin is currently on display in an exhibit at Binesh Gallery.
Named “Mistletoe”, the exhibition runs until June 2 at the gallery located at 22 Khakzad Alley, Vali-e Asr Ave.
title: What’s in Tehran art galleries

description: TEHRAN- A special exhibition is underway at the Film Museum of Iran to commemorate the 42nd anniversary of Khorramshahr's liberation from Iraqi occupation.
title: Photo exhibit marks Khorramshahr liberation anniversary

description: TEHRAN - The textile history museum of Kashan stands as a testament to the rich cultural heritage and enduring legacy of textile craft skills in the ancient city.
title: Textile history museum in Kashan: a journey through threads of time

description: TEHRAN - Chehel Tekeh Duzi, also known as scrap quilting, is a cherished handicraft from the Chaharmahal-Bakhtiari province, southwest Iran.
title: Chehel Tekeh Duzi: a vibrant handicraft from southwest Iran

description: TEHRAN – After 12 days of winding their way through Iranian soil, an Australian couple, traveling in a classic Bean from England to Australia, has brought the curtain on their journey through the Islamic Republic.
title: Couple’s 100-year-old car traverses Iran on way to Australia

description: TEHRAN - Fars province has initiated a project aimed at creating jobs in the handicrafts sector, in honor of Martyr President Seyyed-Ebrahim Raisi, who lost his life last week in a helicopter crash, with a pilot program starting in Kharameh county.
title: Fars launches crafts job creation initiative in memory of President Raisi

description: TEHRAN - The Seljuk Dynasty, the first Turkish rulers of the Muslim world, brought a renaissance to the Islamic Caliphate, characterized by religious fervor and robust governance.
title: From mosques to mausoleums: architecture under Seljuk patronage

description: The International Court of Justice at The Hague on Friday ordered Israel to halt its military operations in Rafah in response to a request by South Africa for provisional measures to protect the Palestinian population in Gaza.
title: ICJ orders Israel to 'immediately halt' Rafah offensive

description: TEHRAN–The Iranian Red Crescent Society has sent a consignment of relief items to flood victims in Afghanistan.
title: IRCS send relief consignment to flood-hit Afghanistan

description: TEHRAN – Yasin Khosravi of Iran took the gold medal at the 2024 World Para Athletics Championships on Friday.
title: Iran’s Khosravi takes gold at 2024 World Para Athletics

description: TEHRAN –The World Space Week Association has announced the theme of the World Space Week 2024, October 4 to 10, will be 'Space and Climate Change'.
title: World Space Week to put spotlight on ‘Space, Climate Change’

description: TEHRAN –In a meeting held at Iran's headquarters for the development of nanotechnology on Friday, Pakistan asked for establishing a joint research institute of nanotechnology and biotechnology.
title: Pakistan seeks joint nanotech, biotech research with Iran

description: TEHRAN – Iraj Kakavand, the anti-narcotics police chief, has announced the country’s opposition to the legalization and decriminalization of drugs.
title: Iran voices opposition to decriminalization of drugs

description: TEHRAN - The director general of the East Asia-Pacific Office of the Trade Promotion Organization of Iran (TPO) announced that the Preferential Trade Agreement (PTA) between Iran and Indonesia is going to go operational soon to enhance trade-economic ties.
title: Iran-Indonesia PTA to go operational soon

description: TEHRAN - The Deputy Prime Minister of the Government of the Russian Federation has expressed his condolences on the tragic loss of the Iranian president Ibrahim Raisi during a phone call with the Iranian Oil Minister Javad Oji,
title: Novak expresses condolences over tragic loss of Pres. Raisi

description: TEHRAN - In a talk show on national TV, Iranian OIl Minister Javad Oji, explained how the late president, Ibrahim Raisi, was serious about developing oil industry projects.
title: Oji outlines Raisi administration’s oil industry achievements

description: TEHRAN - Iran’s foreign trade registered a considerable jump during the late President Ebrahim Raisi’s administration (32 months in service) and reached more than $301 billion, the Islamic Republic of Iran Customs Administration (IRICA) said.
title: Foreign trade on upward trend during President Raisi’s term: IRICA

description: TEHRAN - The commercial envoy and second deputy of Thailand’s Embassy in Iran, Trirong Wan-Ar-ree, said his country is pursuing a visa waiver agreement between Tehran and Bangkok.
title: Visa waiver between Iran, Thailand to be pursued: envoy

description: TEHRAN - The World Bank, in its latest report on the economic situation in Iran, has examined the performance of the administration of late President Ebrahim Raisi, indicating its successful track record in the economic sphere.
title: World Bank evaluation of Raisi administration proves its economic success

description: TEHRAN – Kioumars Hashemi, the Iranian Minister of Sports and Youth, met with his Russian counterpart Mikhail Degtyarev in the meeting of the Council of Foreign Ministers of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) member states in Astana, Kazakhstan on Thursday.
title: Iran sports minister Hashemi meets with his Russian counterpart

description: TEHRAN – Kioumars Hashemi, the Iranian Minister of Sports and Youth, met with his Russian counterpart Mikhail Degtyarev in the meeting of the Council of Foreign Ministers of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) member states in Astana, Kazakhstan on Thursday.
title: Iran sports minster Hashemi meets with his Russian counterpart

description: TEHRAN – Iran defeated Chinese Taipei 3-1 (24-26, 25-20, 25-18, 28-26) in the 2024 AVC Challenge Cup for Women on Friday.
title: Iran defeat Chinese Taipei at 2024 AVC Challenge Cup for Women

description: TEHRAN - The Iranian Armed Forces have issued an initial report on the helicopter crash that resulted in the martyrdom of President Ebrahim Raeisi and his accompanying delegation.
title: Iran Armed Forces release initial report on President's deadly helicopter crash
